name: Candy Quest (Cate)
description:
Candy collecting action!Start a trick by pressing. the spacebar on a house's porch! Use the WASD keys (or Arrow Keys if selected in the options menu) to win copious amounts of candy! You'll also have the chance to take some from the bowl left outside some houses, but don't get too greedy! Afterwards, use your candies to unlock new costumes with faster speeds, reward multipliers, and more difficult trick combos!

Created in six days for the Dallas Society of Play Trick-or-Treat Jam.
